get.description:
Get the message to sign to generate a JWT token.
Do not hardcode this message as it is dynamic and can be subject to changes.

post.description: Provide a signature and get back a valid JWT that allows order actions

hash.description: An optional string hash for the order, if provided, it must match the hash of the order

salt.description: A positive i64 bigint string representing the salt, max value is 2^63-1

tokenId.description: An integer string for the ERC-1155 outcome's token ID

makerAmount.description: An integer string representing the maker amount in wei

takerAmount.description: An integer string representing the taker amount in wei

expiration.description: A unix timestamp in seconds, must be in the future

nonce.description: An i32 positive integer string for the nonce to be used for on-chain cancellations, max value is 2^31-1

feeRateBps.description: An integer string for the fee in basis point

signatureType.description: The signature type, only 0 is supported

schema.description: a string

post.description: Remove orders from the orderbook for JWT signer. Note: This will not cancel the order on-chain, you should also cancel the order on-chain as outlined in the documentation. This endpoint allows you to cancel orders fast and batch the on-chain cancellation of orders later. You can also just cancel the order on-chain directly (recommended for most use cases).
